str2: Then, at that time. From ho and hote; the when, i.e. At the time that.

parse: Verb - Perfect Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Plural

str2: A deity, especially the supreme Divinity; figuratively, a magistrate; by Hebraism, very.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: To be a slave, be subject to, obey, be devoted. From doulos; to be a slave to.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
From phuo; growth, i.e. natural production; by extension, a genus or sort; figuratively, native disposition, constitution or usage.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Dative Masculine Plural
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.
Not, lest. A primary particle of qualified negation; not, lest; also (whereas ou expects an affirmative one) whether.
A deity, especially the supreme Divinity; figuratively, a magistrate; by Hebraism, very.
